title: Estate Planning Information Session
author: LifeSource
description: Are you interested in learning about creating a legacy through estate planning? Regardless of the size of your "estate," YOU can create a legacy and make a future impact that honors your values and interests.
cleaned_text: Aug 12 Healing Garden and Donor Memorial Wall Ceremony Please join us as we unveil the newest names added to our Memorial Wall and Garden Bench dedications at our Minneapolis headquarters. Date: Saturday, August 12, 2023 Time: 9:00 a.m. - 10:30 a.m. 9:30 a.m. Donate Life Flag Raising Location: LifeSource Minneapolis Headquarters ( [Open Map)](https://goo.gl/maps/pYniZmp9LwzYTfic9) 2225 West River Road N, Minneapolis, MN 55411 Light refreshments will be provided. This is an outdoor, open house-style event and no RSVP is required. A program will be held, rain or shine, at 9:30 a.m. with a raising of the Donate Life Flag. For updates about the event, or to learn more about our legacy opportunities, please visit: [life-source.org/legacy](http://life-source.org/legacy) Questions?
